turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, it's me, I'm heading back to the office.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I've got some messages for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They can wait, you know what I'd like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What's that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like for you call the Starbucks at Coliseum and Tanger and order me a Caffe' Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The big one, I never can keep those sizes straight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Probably the Grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds right. What's the other one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's the small one, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think that's right. I'll call your order in.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, I can pick it up on my way. Order anything you want as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks, I might do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'ts me, I placed the order, it will be waiting for you at the Coliseum Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, I appreciate it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They'll text your receipt to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh good. What would I do without you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I don't know, but I'll see you when you get here.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
